GSD.description:
fs/ntfs3: Validate BOOT record_size

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.17 by commit 8702e0dc987014f6d77740b693340f91344fd0ae. For more details please see the references link.
